        <div class="excerpt">

        </div>

        <h3><a href="/questions/19120371/postgresql-hstore-error-when-storing-data-with-different-types" class="question-hyperlink">PostGreSQL hstore - Error when storing data with different types</a></h3>
        <div class="excerpt">
            I have a python dict which is countaining data with different types ie. integer and char.

dict = {"type": 1 , "precision": 0 , "width": 20 , "name": "test" }


When saving this dict into an hstore ...
        </div>

    </div>
    <div class="summary">        
        <h3><a href="/questions/19120369/cclabelttf-multiline-label-not-working" class="question-hyperlink">CCLabelTTF multiline label not working</a></h3>
        <div class="excerpt">
            I am trying to create a multiline label in cocos2d 1.0 using CCLabelTTF. I have tried the examples that I have come across, but none seem to work. Here is what I have

CCLabelTTF *storeLabelHeading = ...
        </div>
             
        <div class="tags t-cocos2d-iphone t-multiline t-cclabelttf">

                    <a href="/questions/tagged/objective-c" class="post-tag" title="show questions tagged 'objective-c'" rel="tag">objective-c</a>&nbsp;<span class="item-multiplier"><span class="item-multiplier-x">&times;</span>&nbsp;<span class="item-multiplier-count">150297</span></span><br>
                    <a href="/questions/tagged/ruby-on-rails" class="post-tag" title="show questions tagged 'ruby-on-rails'" rel="tag">ruby-on-rails</a>&nbsp;<span class="item-multiplier"><span class="item-multiplier-x">&times;</span>&nbsp;<span class="item-multiplier-count">132543</span></span><br>
                    <a href="/questions/tagged/c" class="post-tag" title="show questions tagged 'c'" rel="tag">c</a>&nbsp;<span class="item-multiplier"><span class="item-multiplier-x">&times;</span>&nbsp;<span class="item-multiplier-count">109150</span></span><br>
                    <a href="/questions/tagged/ruby" class="post-tag" title="show questions tagged 'ruby'" rel="tag">ruby</a>&nbsp;<span class="item-multiplier"><span class="item-multiplier-x">&times;</span>&nbsp;<span class="item-multiplier-count">83453</span></span><br>
                    <a href="/questions/tagged/sql-server" class="post-tag" title="show questions tagged 'sql-server'" rel="tag">sql-server</a>&nbsp;<span class="item-multiplier"><span class="item-multiplier-x">&times;</span>&nbsp;<span class="item-multiplier-count">77293</span></span><br>
                    <a href="/questions/tagged/xml" class="post-tag" title="show questions tagged 'xml'" rel="tag">xml</a>&nbsp;<span class="item-multiplier"><span class="item-multiplier-x">&times;</span>&nbsp;<span class="item-multiplier-count">72082</span></span><br>

    ados.run = ados.run || [];

</script>

    var _qevents = _qevents || [];
    (function () {
        var ssl='https:'==document.location.protocol,
            s=document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0],
            ga=document.createElement('script');
        ga.type='text/javascript';
        ga.async=true;
        ga.src=(ssl?'https://ssl':'http://www')+'.google-analytics.com/ga.js';
        s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga,s);
        var sc=document.createElement('script');
        sc.type='text/javascript';
        sc.async=true;
        sc.src=(ssl?'https://secure':'http://edge')+'.quantserve.com/quant.js';
        s.parentNode.insertBefore(sc,s);
    })();
